docs.text: blade is the movie that shows that wesley snipes really can live up to his potential as one of hollywood's premier leading men .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: blade is based on the comic book character of the same name and has that comic book kind of feel to it .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is a very stylish movie and for the most part that style works very well .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: although , at a few points i thought i was watching a music video as opposed to a movie .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the ideas behind blade are good , as is the basic plot of the story .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but at times , things seem to get a bit muddled , and the writers appear to want to do too many things at once .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: that really doesn't take away from the story too much , but it does hurt it a little bit .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: blade ( snipes ) is half man , half vampire .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: his mother was bitten by a vampire when she was pregnant with him and as a result he has many of the classic traits of a vampire .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: including a thirst for human blood that must be kept under control by a special serum which quenches his blood lust .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: blade has spent his life hunting down and killing vampires as a sort of revenge for the fact that one of their kind killed his mother .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but this isn't as easy as it seems , because the vampires in blade's world are more sophisticated than the ones that you find in most films .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the government and other authorities know of the existence of vampires , but they let them feast of the population at large because they are taking bribes from the vampires .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: where do vampires get money ?
docs.label: positive

docs.text: well , in blade , they run multinational companies in order to finance their vampire organizations .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i personally thought that this whole secret corporate world run by vampires to be a very clever idea , and a great addition to the movie .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: blade runs up against the evil deacon frost ( stephen dorff ) a maverick in the vampire community .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he isn't content to live among humans , and is convinced that the vampire race is the superior one and he means to insure its superiority .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: he has managed to translate the ancient vampire scrolls that tell of the method of making him an all-powerful vampire -- rendering him virtually unstoppable .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's up to blade to see that this doesn't transpire .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: admittedly , blade is style over substance through and through .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the story is a relatively forgettable one , but it is fun none the less .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the acting in blade is just about what you would expect from a movie of this type .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this isn't a film that is going to win accolades for its performances , and the actors know this .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the movie is played for fun and nobody seems to think otherwise .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it's a popcorn movie , and no one involved has any illusions otherwise .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: blade's production values are as slick as any that you will find in your typical summer blockbuster .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the combat sequences between blade and his vampire targets are incredibly well done .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: although , the mtv-style cuts did get on my nerves after a while during long sequences .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: blade is a fun movie with an interesting take on the vampire genre .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this is not the movie for those of you who like your vampires in tuxedos and living in coffins in the basement of some gothic castle .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: what blade excels at is bringing the classic lore of the vampire into the next century with a fresh outlook on life .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: very cool .
docs.label: positive
